lesson.title: Horizontal Database Partitioning
lesson.summary: Sharding distributes data across multiple database instances to handle large datasets and high throughput requirements.
lesson.real_world_example: Instagram shards user data by user ID, allowing them to store billions of photos across thousands of database servers
